targets.expr: count(100 - ((node_filesystem_avail_bytes{server=~"$server", mountpoint="/", fstype!="rootfs"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{server=~"$server", mountpoint="/", fstype!="rootfs"}) * 100) >= 90) or vector(0)

count(100 - ((node_filesystem_avail_bytes{server=~"$server", mountpoint="/", fstype!="rootfs"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{server=~"$server", mountpoint="/", fstype!="rootfs"}) * 100) >= 80 < 90) or vector(0)

panels.title: Sys Load
